channel.title: Kodis on wonslung Fire Stick help

item.title: Kodi
item.description: What is Kodi? Kodi is a piece of software designed to serve as a media center. With third party addons, it can stream media from all over the internet. First Start When you first start Kodi please allow 60-90 seconds before attempting use. How to use Kodi. Note These instructions are specific to the wonslung FireStick Skin kodi build Navigating Kodi When you open Kodi you will see the following menu: The Fire Stick remote navigation button is used to navigate the main menu menu.
